title: 报错 来人看看
author: 用笔写寂寞
txt_content:
[21:31:48] [Server thread/WARN]: [BarAPI] Task #1636 for BarAPI v3.4 generated an exception
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.block.CraftBlock.getRelative(CraftBlock.java:187) ~[spigot.jar:git-Spigot-fdc1440-12dc48b]
        at me.confuser.barapi.BarAPI.getDragonLocation(BarAPI.java:388) ~[?:?]
        at me.confuser.barapi.BarAPI.addDragon(BarAPI.java:360) ~[?:?]
        at me.confuser.barapi.BarAPI.access$600(BarAPI.java:34) ~[?:?]
        at me.confuser.barapi.BarAPI$4.run(BarAPI.java:523) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:71) ~[spigot.jar:git-Spigot-fdc1440-12dc48b]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:350) [spigot.jar:git-Spigot-fdc1440-12dc48b]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.B(MinecraftServer.java:722) [spigot.jar:git-Spigot-fdc1440-12dc48b]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.DedicatedServer.B(DedicatedServer.java:374) [spigot.jar:git-Spigot-fdc1440-12dc48b]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.A(MinecraftServer.java:653) [spigot.jar:git-Spigot-fdc1440-12dc48b]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:556) [spigot.jar:git-Spigot-fdc1440-12dc48b]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.7.0_79]
[21:32:01] [Server thread/INFO]: Cyrin issued

replies.author: 名不够响亮
replies.txt_content:
BarAPI v3.4跟龙有关的地方出现了问题
个人觉得可能是插件版本问题，或者是插件本身问题
